description:
Bankruptcy is a great way to wipe the slate clean and gain a fresh start. However, filing for bankruptcy is rarely easy. The Ingram Firm, L.L.C. - a trusted Columbia, Maryland, law firm - helps individuals lay the groundwork for a better and more stable financial future. Attorneys Anika T. Ingram and Damani K. Ingram understand that the legal decisions and events leading up to bankruptcy can affect filers and their loved ones for years to come. Following the free initial consultation, they diligently handle the details of a case and provide knowledgeable counsel so as to obtain a resolution that has the most promise for a better life on the other side.

The law firm is a full-service firm that represents clients in a myriad of issues. In addition to handling all types of bankruptcy and other debtor-creditor matters, it competently sees clients through the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Civil rights
  • Medical malpractice
  • Premises liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Criminal defense
  • DUI/DWI
  • Family law
  • Divorce
  • Child custody
  • Business and commercial law
  • Business organizations
  • Immigration and naturalization law
  • Entertainment, sports and leisure law

The brother-and-sister legal duo that is Ms. Ingram and Mr. Ingram founded The Ingram Firm, L.L.C., with a desire to help others. Both attorneys view the law as the perfect avenue for doing so.

Clients of the law firm can trust they will receive superior representation with a personalized touch. They can also trust that the team will do what it can to ease the stress of their legal issues, including scheduling virtual appointments and accepting credit cards as payment.

The Ingram Firm, L.L.C., is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
